question:
Which of the following were the objectives Paris Agreement?
1. It aimed to hold the increase in global average temperature to well below 2 째C above pre industrial levels.
2. Efforts were to be aimed to limit temperature increase to 1.5째C above pre-industrial levels.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Paris Agreement aimed to hold the increase in global average temperature to well below 2 째C above pre industrial levels. Efforts were to be aimed to limit temperature increase to 1.5째C above pre-industrial levels.
